mapper.update: UPDATE STN_GOODS SET RDCNT = RDCNT + 1 WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}

UPDATE STN_GOODS g INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.GOODS_ID ,COUNT(*) AS SLE_CO FROM STN_ORDER o LEFT JOIN STN_ORDER a ON a.GOODS_ID = o.GOODS_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE o.ORDER_GROUP_NO = #{value} AND o.USE_AT = 'Y' GROUP BY o.GOODS_ID ) c ON c.GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID SET g.SLE_CO = c.SLE_CO WHERE g.GOODS_ID IN ( SELECT GOODS_ID FROM STN_ORDER WHERE ORDER_GROUP_NO = #{value} )
